title: FIRE fans carefully planned their early retirement. Then health-insurance costs exploded.
description: With pandemic-era subsidies for Obamacare set to end in 2026, people in the FIRE community are adjusting their plans to account for bigger health-insurance...
content: The amount that subsidized consumers pay for Affordable Care Act plans is expected to double on average next year, according to KFF. This means some people pursuing financial independence and early r… [+8746 chars]
